nodes.full_name: A Tool for Improving Privacy through Enterprise Risk Management - Version 1.1
nodes.purpose: Enhance privacy engineering practices supporting privacy by design concepts in AI systems
nodes.name: NIST Privacy Framework 1.1
Protect-P
nodes.v11_updates: Aligned with CSF 2.0 Protect function, enhanced data protection measures
nodes.definition: Develop and implement appropriate data processing safeguards to prevent cybersecurity-related privacy events
nodes.primary_focus: Cybersecurity-related privacy protection, data safeguards, technical controls

nodes.name: Predictability
nodes.v11_updates: Enhanced focus on AI explainability and predictable AI system behavior
nodes.definition: Enabling reliable assumptions by individuals, owners, and operators about data and their processing by systems including AI systems

nodes.name: PII Exposure in Training Data
nodes.description: Personal information inadvertently included in AI training datasets, potentially exposed through model outputs

nodes.name: Membership Inference Attacks
nodes.description: Ability to determine if specific data points were used in AI model training, potentially revealing sensitive information

nodes.name: Prompt Injection Vulnerabilities
nodes.description: Malicious inputs that manipulate AI systems to reveal private information or bypass privacy controls

nodes.name: Data Reconstruction Attacks
nodes.description: AI models may enable reconstruction of training data or reveal sensitive information through model inversion attacks

nodes.name: Protective Technology
nodes.v11_updates: AI-aware protective technologies

nodes.name: AI-aware protective technologies safeguard data processing and prevent privacy attacks
nodes.v11_updates: AI-aware protective technologies for privacy attack prevention

nodes.name: Maintenance
nodes.v11_updates: AI system maintenance and updates

nodes.name: Data Security
nodes.v11_updates: AI data protection and cybersecurity alignment

nodes.name: Data-at-rest are protected including AI training datasets and model parameters
nodes.v11_updates: AI training data and model protection

nodes.name: Identity Management, Authentication, and Access Control
nodes.v11_updates: Enhanced access control aligned with CSF 2.0

nodes.name: Identities and credentials are managed for authorized access to AI systems and data
nodes.v11_updates: AI system access control aligned with CSF 2.0

nodes.name: Data Protection Policies, Processes, and Procedures
nodes.v11_updates: Aligned with CSF 2.0 Protect function structure

nodes.name: Communicate-P
nodes.v11_updates: AI transparency requirements, enhanced stakeholder communication
nodes.definition: Develop and implement appropriate activities to enable organizations and individuals to have a reliable understanding and engage in dialogue about data processing and privacy risks
nodes.primary_focus: Transparency, stakeholder communication, data processing awareness

nodes.name: Deepfake and Likeness Rights
nodes.description: AI generation of synthetic content that violates individual likeness rights or creates misleading representations

nodes.name: Statistical and Cognitive Bias
nodes.description: AI-assisted decisions that exhibit unfair bias affecting individuals or groups, leading to discriminatory outcomes

nodes.name: Data Processing Awareness
nodes.v11_updates: AI processing awareness and stakeholder communication

nodes.name: Impacted individuals are notified about privacy breaches including AI-related incidents
nodes.v11_updates: AI-related privacy incident notification

nodes.name: Mechanisms for communicating data processing including AI system operations are established
nodes.v11_updates: AI transparency and explainability communication requirements

nodes.name: Communication Policies, Processes, and Procedures
nodes.v11_updates: AI transparency and explainability communication

nodes.name: Communication policies address AI transparency and stakeholder engagement requirements
nodes.v11_updates: AI transparency policies and stakeholder communication

nodes.name: Control-P
nodes.v11_updates: AI-specific control mechanisms, enhanced individual empowerment
nodes.definition: Develop and implement appropriate activities to enable organizations or individuals to manage data with sufficient granularity to manage privacy risks
nodes.primary_focus: Data processing management, individual empowerment, disassociated processing

nodes.name: Disassociability
nodes.v11_updates: Privacy-preserving AI techniques (federated learning, differential privacy, secure multi-party computation)
nodes.definition: Enabling processing of data without association to individuals beyond operational requirements using privacy-preserving AI techniques

nodes.name: Manageability
nodes.v11_updates: AI data governance and model output management capabilities
nodes.definition: Providing capability for granular administration of data including AI-generated data and model outputs

nodes.name: Disassociated Processing
nodes.v11_updates: AI privacy-preserving techniques and disassociation

nodes.name: Data are processed to limit observability and linkability using privacy-preserving AI techniques
nodes.v11_updates: Privacy-preserving AI techniques (differential privacy, federated learning)

nodes.name: Data Processing Management
nodes.v11_updates: AI data management and individual empowerment controls

nodes.name: Data elements can be accessed for review including AI-generated insights
nodes.v11_updates: AI-generated data and insights accessibility

nodes.name: Data Processing Policies, Processes, and Procedures
nodes.v11_updates: AI-specific data processing controls

nodes.name: Data processing policies address AI system controls and individual empowerment
nodes.v11_updates: AI-specific data processing controls and policies

nodes.name: Govern-P
nodes.v11_updates: Standalone governance capabilities, enhanced organizational accountability
nodes.definition: Develop and implement the organizational governance structure to enable an ongoing understanding of the organization's risk management priorities informed by privacy risk
nodes.primary_focus: Governance structure, policies, risk management strategy, organizational accountability

nodes.name: Organizational Oversight
nodes.v11_updates: New category for enhanced organizational accountability

nodes.name: Senior leadership provides oversight and accountability for privacy and AI governance decisions
nodes.v11_updates: New subcategory for enhanced organizational accountability

nodes.name: Monitoring and Review
nodes.v11_updates: Enhanced accountability and responsibility tracking

nodes.name: Awareness and Training
nodes.v11_updates: AI privacy training and awareness programs

nodes.name: The workforce is informed and trained on privacy responsibilities including AI privacy risks
nodes.v11_updates: AI privacy training and awareness programs

nodes.name: Risk Management Strategy
nodes.v11_updates: AI risk tolerance and strategy frameworks

nodes.name: Organizational risk tolerance is determined including AI privacy risk thresholds
nodes.v11_updates: AI-specific privacy risk tolerance frameworks

nodes.name: Governance Policies, Processes, and Procedures
nodes.v11_updates: Standalone governance without CSF dependency

nodes.name: Organizational privacy values and policies are established including AI governance principles
nodes.v11_updates: Standalone privacy governance, AI governance integration

nodes.name: Identify-P
nodes.v11_updates: Enhanced data lifecycle management, AI data processing identification
nodes.definition: Develop the organizational understanding to manage privacy risk for individuals arising from data processing
nodes.primary_focus: Data processing understanding, privacy risk identification, ecosystem mapping

nodes.name: Data Processing Ecosystem Risk Management
nodes.v11_updates: AI supply chain and ecosystem risk management

nodes.name: AI supply chain and data processing ecosystem privacy risks are identified
nodes.v11_updates: New focus on AI supply chain privacy risks

nodes.name: Risk Assessment
nodes.v11_updates: AI-specific risk assessment methodologies

nodes.name: Potential problematic data actions including AI-specific privacy risks are identified
nodes.v11_updates: AI-specific privacy risk identification (data reconstruction, bias, etc.)

nodes.name: Business Environment
nodes.v11_updates: AI ecosystem stakeholder identification

nodes.name: Inventory and Mapping
nodes.v11_updates: Enhanced AI data inventory and lifecycle mapping

nodes.name: Data processing is mapped throughout the data lifecycle including AI model training and inference
nodes.v11_updates: AI model training and inference lifecycle mapping

nodes.name: Systems/products/services that process data are inventoried including AI systems
nodes.v11_updates: Explicit inclusion of AI systems in inventory

rels.support_area: Governance structure, policies, risk management strategy, organizational accountability
